facet_1.name: Chronoptic Nourishment
facet_1.effects: The nihilist's attacks restore his mana corresponding to the attack damage dealt.

facet_2.name: Misanthropy
facet_2.effects: Diabolic Edict has a shorter explosion interval, but no longer affects buildings. Ã—0 Building Damage Factor, -4s Duration

effects: Leshrac and all enemy units within the radius turns ethereal. They cannot attack, have their movement speed slowed, and reduces all affected enemy units' magic resistance
Causes Split Earth to echo in the same location with a delay duration, increasing its effect radius per instance
The echo location is visible to everyone

abilities.name: Defilement
abilities.description: Grants self flat bonus area-of-effect per current intelligence.
abilities.details: Has 15.4 area-of-effect bonus at hero level 1. Additionally grants 2.45 base area-of-effect bonus per hero level.

abilities.name: Chronoptic Nourishment
abilities.description: The nihilist's attacks restore his mana corresponding to the attack damage dealt.
abilities.details: Selecting the Chronoptic Nourishment facet unlocks this ability. Self mana restores corresponding to the total attack damage applied (after reductions) on the attacked unit.

ability_1.name: Split Earth
ability_1.details: Deals damage and stuns enemy units for a short duration within the radius.
ability_1.description: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
technical_details: Can affect enemy units at max 785/810/835/860-distance away with the cast range and effect radius
Trees within effect radius are destroyed
The ability has neither a visual nor an audio indicator during its effect delay
interaction_notes: With Shard: Now applies its effect 3 times at the area-targeted location
All Split Earth instances have intervals at 0.35s, 5.35s, 10.35s

ability_2.name: Diabolic Edict
ability_2.details: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal pure damage to enemy units. The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.
ability_2.description: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.

facet_effects.misanthropy: Building Damage Factor: 0, Damage Interval: 0.15, Duration: 6

technical_details: Centered on Leshrac upon cast for the entire duration
Creates a negative aura that deals pure spell damage immediately to valid enemy units within the radius
Randomly selects nearby valid enemy units, without priorities, and applies a damage instance per explosion
interaction_notes: Affects Fogged units and Invisible units
Does not affect Hidden units or Invulnerable units
Deals a max 400/720/1040/1360 damage to a lone target within the radius

ability_3.name: Lightning Storm
ability_3.details: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then jumps to nearby enemy units. Struck units have their movement speed slowed.
ability_3.description: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.
technical_details: The magical spell damage can only affect the same enemy units once per cast
The lightning hits the primary target after the effect delay
Jumps to other enemy units within the radius in 0.25-second intervals
interaction_notes: Lightning Storm takes 1.25/1.75/2.25/2.75 seconds to hit all valid targets
All jumps deals up to 450/980/1710/2640 damage per storm instance
With Talent: Pulse Nova procs a Lightning Storm strike on a random enemy unit within 700 radius

ability_4.name: Nihilism
ability_4.details: Leshrac and all enemy units within the radius turns ethereal. They cannot attack, have their movement speed slowed, and reduces all affected enemy units' magic resistance.
ability_4.description: When it serves his purpose, Leshrac briefly reduces his presence in the Terrene Plane.
technical_details: Acquiring Aghanim's Scepter unlocks this ability in the fourth ability slot
Creates a negative aura upon cast centered around Leshrac for the entire duration
Grants 100% physical damage resistance as a secondary effect
interaction_notes: Multiple ethereal-based magic resistance reduction sources do not stack
Dispelling the buff on Leshrac ends the ability prematurely
Affected enemy heroes now has 2.5% magic resistance

ability_5.name: Pulse Nova
ability_5.details: Creates pulse of damaging energy that affects enemy units around Leshrac once per second. Drains Leshrac's mana per pulse.
ability_5.description: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.
technical_details: Toggle does not interrupt Leshrac's channeling abilities
The ability effects are applied as follows: The magical spell damage and the activation mana cost, then loses 25/45/65 current mana in 1-second intervals
Affects Fogged units and Invisible units
interaction_notes: Automatically toggles off if Leshrac does not have enough mana for the next instance
Does not automatically toggle off when affected by Disable, Hidden, or Silence sources
With Talent: Applies generic incoming damage reduction on Leshrac while active

changes: Chronoptic Nourishment: Rescaled attack damage to mana restore factor from 0.14/0.21/0.28/0.35 to 0.25 on each level
Chronoptic Nourishment: This component no longer levels up with Pulse Nova
Aghanim's Shard upgrade: Reduced Split Earth number of instance bonus from 3 to 2
Increased Chronoptic Nourishment attack damage to mana restore factor from 0.1/0.18/0.26/0.34 to 0.14/0.21/0.28/0.35
Increased Diabolic Edict mana cost from 90/110/130/150 to 90/120/150/180
Lightning Storm no longer applies a 50-attack speed slow
Increased Defilement flat area-of-effect bonus per intelligence from 0.4 to 0.7
Increased Chronoptic Nourishment attack damage to mana restore factor from 0.1/0.14/0.18/0.22 to 0.1/0.18/0.26/0.34
Talents: LVL 15 +10% movement speed during Pulse Nova â†’ +10% damage reduction during Pulse Nova
Talents: LVL 20 +20% damage reduction during Pulse Nova â†’ +1 Diabolic Edict max targets
